title: Germany’s World War Two
itunes:title: Germany’s World War Two
itunes:subtitle: In a talk that he delivered at our recent World War Two event in Bristol, Professor Nicholas Stargardt reflects on how the Second World War was experienced by ordinary Germans, both on the front line and back home
description:
In a talk that he delivered at our recent World War Two event in Bristol, Professor Nicholas Stargardt reflects on how the Second World War was experienced by ordinary Germans, both on the front line and back home

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
